name: Friends & Dragons - Puzzle RPG
description:
Fight epic battles in this challenging turn-based strategy RPG with over 165 heroes, level them up and create the perfect team! Battle fire breathing dragons, crawl challenging dungeons, loot boundless treasure and equip your heroes. Can you beat the heroic challenges that await you? Download now for FREE and begin your journey.

FEATURES TURN-BASED STRATEGY gameplay with a unique time restriction and flipping game mechanic.
SUMMON & COLLECT over 150 legendary heroes.
PLAY UNIQUE CO-OP with your friends & guildmates.
JOIN GUILDS to earn more loot. Play better, together!
ENROLL IN THE CAMPAIGN and fight in hundreds of dungeons filled with monsters.
FIGHT HEROIC CHALLENGES every week and earn additional rewards.
COLLECT MYTHIC LOOT in bounties, dungeons and in the campaign.
ASCEND YOUR HEROES and unlock new skills and dormant powers.
MATCH YOUR HEROES leader powers and grant additional attack or defence to your team

NOTE! You can play the game for free, however some game items can be purchased with real money.
Under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Friends and Dragons. The game requires a network connection.
